materials.raw_text: Co: 10 g, Er: 10 g, Fe: 10 g, P: 5 g, Si: 5 g

sourcing.instructions: Co: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online marketplace (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich). Er: Specialty metal supplier or online. Fe: Local hardware store. P: Chemical supply store or online. Si: Electronics store or online.
steps: Co: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online marketplace (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich). Er: Specialty metal supplier or online. Fe: Local hardware store. P: Chemical supply store or online. Si: Electronics store or online.

1. Weigh each ingredient using a precision scale. 2. In a clean, dry container, combine 10 g of Co, 10 g of Er, 10 g of Fe, 5 g of P, and 5 g of Si. 3. Mix thoroughly using a spatula to ensure uniform distribution of all components. 4. Transfer the mixture to a ball mill for finer mixing, milling for 30 minutes.
